title: S5 Ep20: Director's Cut: The past and the future of European banking supervision
itunes:title: Director's Cut: The past and the future of European banking supervision
description: In this episode of the Director's cut, Bruegel's director Guntram Wolff hosts a conversation with Danièle Nouy, the first chair of the European Single Supervisory Mechanism. On the eve of the end of her mandate she traces the legacy of her five years and the prospects for the future of banking supervision in Europe.
